name: Game of Thrones: Episode Four - Sons of Winter
name_original: Game of Thrones: Episode Four - Sons of Winter
description:
Game of Thrones: Episode Four - Sons of Winter is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Telltale Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Game of Thrones: Episode Four - Sons of Winter is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
